title: Possible Android 10 fix is on the way
content:
Looks like a potential fix is available. No reports yet if it does solve battery issues. Let us know if it solves your battery drains.

UPDATE 9/23: Google added another build today as QP1A.190711.020.C3. They didnâ€™t say who the build is for or if it fixes something critical, but that build is available for the Pixel 3a and 3a XL, as well as the Pixel 3 and 3 XL.

https://www.droid-life.com/2019/09/23/android-10-updates-pixel-phone-google/
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
